Kamodia:..*moan*..... *Kamodia stands up holding her head and sits next to =
Wrath* Kamodia: Hey, you okay? Wrath: who's there? Kamodia: It's me. Does K=
amodia ring a bell? Wrath: You better call for help. Kamodia: It's not to f=
ar till the base and it'd be no problem leading you. *Kamodia helps Wrath u=
p they begin to walk back base but Kamodia has to guide Wrath*
  ----- Orig=
inal Message ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Tues=
day, June 06, 2000 1:53 AM
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  Gangon looked =
over in time to see the battle between the new bot and her buddy's of Mante=
lla and Drazom fighting with Wrath and Kamodia.
   
  "Sheesh! Did you see =
that dragon bot throw his girlfriend at the enemy like that? Whoo! I would =
never do that to you BrightBlade. If I could pick you up in the first place=
, that is." Gangon said. Lightmare smiled at the idea as she looked at Brig=
htBlade...
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: ilovealllizards 
   =
 To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Tuesday, June 06, 2000 1:36 AM
    Subje=
ct: Neo Beast Wars


    *In the People's Base, Wrath and Kamodia convert t=
o robot mode and come out of the hidden passage way in the swamp and run in=
to the jungle and see Drazom and Mantella next to a stasis pod and a Scorpi=
on. They hide in a bush listening to every word* *Over with Drazom and Mant=
ella* Mantella: We come in peace. *The new bot converts to robot mode. Then=
 Mantella holds her hand out for a hand shake* *Mantella: I'm Mantella and =
this is Drazom. *Mantella says while pointing at Drazom. Drazom does a litt=
le wave* Stingtra: I'm Stingtra. *Stingtra says while shaking Mantella's ha=
nd* Drazom: Maybe you'd like to join us? Stingtra: That'd be great. It beat=
s looking for a base anyday! *Wrath and Kamodia hear this from the bush the=
ir hiding in* Wrath: Well well well, If it isn't Stinktra and the sideshow =
freaks! *Wrath says as he and Kamodia step out from behind the bush* *Sting=
tra's optics narrow*  *Stingtra pulls out her Machine gun and starts shooti=
ng at Kamodia while Drazom picks Mantella up and throws her at Wrath attemp=
ing to knock him down but instead Wrath catches Mantella holds her up in ai=
r and throws her the ground. Then Kamodia slips under the Machine gun shots=
 and charges at Stingtra knocking her down. Wrath then picks Mantella up an=
d pins her to a tree and starts puching her but it doesn't last long before=
 Drazom walks over and punches Wrath and with that Wrath falls on his bum h=
olding his face. Then Drazom pulls him up and starts kneeing him in the gut=
 and then drops him to the ground. Stingtra starts head butting Kamodia in =
the face till Kamodia gets off of Stingtra. Then Stingtra jumps to her feet=
 and picks up a stick and runs at Kamodia with it but Kamodia grabs the sti=
ck and swings Stingtra around drops her on ground. And Kamodia charges at S=
tingtra but Stingtra is on her back and she scoops Kamodia up on her feet a=
nd flips her face first into a tree and Kamodia falls to the ground in pain=
. Then Stingtra jumps to her feet. Wrath climbs to his feet and kicks Drazo=
m in gut. Then Wrath starts rapidly punching Mantella over and over again t=
ill she spits poison in his optics. Wrath falls to the ground yelling being=
 blind at the moment* Drazom: I think Quickstrike is going to welcome you w=
ith open arms. *Drazom says to Stingtra *Drazom, Mantella and Stingtra conv=
ert to beast mode and then Drazom bends down letting Stingtra climb up  on =
his back and then he grabs Mantella in his arms and takes of flying towards=
 the Predacon base*
